name: intro_frame_one
english: it is the year 2100| and earth is no longer what it used to be
swahili: ni mwaka wa 2100| na dunia haiko vile ilivyokuwa kitambo

name: intro_frame_two
english: years of excess industrialisation have turned it into a desolate landscape
swahili: miaka mengi ya ujenzi iliyozidi imefanya ardhi iwe kavu

name: intro_frame_three
english: but this doesn't stop beedee and her tireless team of workers
swahili: lakini hii haitasimamisha beedee na wafanyikazi wenzake

name: intro_frame_four
english: are you ready to help her save her colony and restore her home?
swahili: je| uko tayari kumsaidia kuokoa mzinga yake na kurejesha nyumbani yake?
